snippet: The leader of Boko Haram has been wounded and replaced, the president of Chad said in a state radio broadcast Wednesday.
abstract: Pres Idriss Deby of Chad announces in state radio broadcast that Abubakar Shekau, leader of Boko Haram, has ceded control of the Islamist militant group; predicts that group, which has terrorized Nigeria and spread attacks to neighboring countries, will be unable to continue operations within months.
lead_paragraph: The leader of Boko Haram has been wounded and replaced, the president of Chad said in a state radio broadcast Wednesday.

headline.main: Nigeria: Boko Haram Is Said to Have a New Leader
headline.print_headline: Africa; Nigeria: Boko Haram Is Said to Have a New Leader
